about.title: About Try Unity Solutions
about.description:
Try Unity Solutions is a creative and tech-driven software agency based in Pakistan, dedicated to turning innovative ideas into scalable digital products. We specialize in building websites, mobile apps, desktop applications, and crafting exceptional UI/UX designs that align with modern user expectations and business goals.

Whether you're a startup, a business owner, or a university student looking for professional project development, our expert team delivers clean, optimized, and future-ready solutions — fast, affordable, and high quality.
services: Mobile App Development (Cross-platform Flutter apps for Android & iOS)
UI/UX Design (Figma, Adobe XD – Interactive, Intuitive Interfaces)
University Project Support (End-to-end development with documentation)
Cross-Platform Development (One codebase for Web, App, and Desktop)

skills.frontend: React.js, Next.js, JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, Material UI, Chakra UI, Framer Motion
skills.otherTools: Git & GitHub, REST APIs, Responsive Design, UI Animations
